# fl-spinner

This is a spinner

## Examples

<fl-spinner size='md'></fl-spinner>

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type                                                             | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `size`     | `size`     | Spinner size                                       | `"sm" \| "md" \| "lg"`                                           | `"md"`      |
